author: khmarbaise
msg: * created the correct structure
german/book and put the translated parts
of the book into the book directory.

author: khmarbaise
msg: * trunk/doc/translations/german/: Removed.  Instead, we'll need a
subdirectory 'book' to get a consistent layout if other docs
get translated.

author: sussman
msg: Book tweak.
* doc/book/book/ch06.xml:  reword explanation of svnserve's CRAM-MD5 authn.
Emphasize the fact that the password never travels over the network.

author: xsteve
msg: Better treatment for marked files when some files are hidden
* trunk/contrib/client-side/psvn/psvn.el:
(svn-process-sentinel): After a commit or a revert: run (svn-status-update)
(svn-status-ediff-with-revision): Use the correct emacs major mode for the
ediff partner

author: brane
msg: Make sure we really do open the BDB environment the same way everywhere.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_base/fs.c (create_env): New function. Creates
the BDB environment and sets allocators. Use everywhere instead of
db_env_create, and remove other calls to set_alloc.
(allocate_env): Remove special error handling for set_alloc, since
create_env now takes care of that, and set_alloc can't fail if the
immediately preceding db_env_create succeeded.
